This session brings together leaders who’ve driven significant change programmes on small budgets. Learn how to create impact and deliver results and understand the value of small, strategic interventions to create ripple effects. text_direction=”default”]This session looks at examples of employee-led initiatives which have sparked significant change. Discover how to turn employee feedback into actionable change, what you can do to empower employee networks, and how to build trust with networks so you can amplify initiatives together. use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1756394382490{padding-top: 2% !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Mainstream media consistently misrepresents or ignores Black perspectives, but leading Black creators have turned this challenge into motivation to deliver authentic narratives that resonate. This panel brings together innovative storytellers who’ve gained credibility and secured buy-in from major media brands while staying true to their authentic voice. Understand how to find fresh inspiration, discover strategies for creating content that genuinely connects with audiences, and understand how to build the influence needed to create the stories you want to see in the world.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

platinum status with hits like ‘21 Seconds’ that shaped a generation. Now, as founder of Maffia Rum, House of Maffia, and Lyrical UK, she’s building businesses that reach entirely new audiences. This conversation will explore how creativity becomes the foundation for everything else you build, why following your passions in different directions creates incredible opportunities, and how to sustain a multi-decade career that evolves beyond music.
